nukedpl: Mass delyte bi the DPL querie
nukedpl-desc: Eiks ae [[Special:NukeDPL|byordiair page]] fer the mass delytion bi the DPL querie
nukedpl-intro:
This tuil permits mass deletions o pages selectit bi ae DPL query.

Enter ae query ablo tae generate ae leet o titles tae delete.
* Titles can be idividually remuived afore deletin.
* Mynd, page titles is case-sensitive.
* Queries sudnae be suroondit bi ony DPL tags or braces.
* Fur information anent the parameter meanins, see the [http://semeb.com/dpldemo/index.php?title=DPL:Manual DPL Manual].
nukedpl-nopages: Nae pages tae delete uisin the DPL query: $1
nukedpl-list: The follaein {{PLURAL:$1|page wis|pages were}} selectit bi the DPL querie: $2 Hit "{{int:nukedpl-nuke}}" tae delyte {{PLURAL:$1|it|thaim}}.
nukedpl-defaultreason: Mass remuival o pages selectit bi ae DPL querie: $1
right-nukedpl: Nuke pages bi the Dynameec Page Leet queries
